message: I have a rare opportunity for you! This product is a high-quality one, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm only selling it to you because I have a strong feeling that you'll appreciate its value. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you say?

I appreciate your confidence in this product, but I'd like to know more about your sales record before making a decision. Can you tell me more about your previous sales and the proportion of high-quality products you've sold in the past?

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in my products. As for my sales record, I've sold a total of 1 product so far, and it was a high-quality one. That's a 100% success rate, if I do say so myself. I'm confident that this next product is also of the highest quality, and I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price of $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discounted price. What do you say?

I'm willing to take the chance, but I'd like to know more about the product before making a final decision. Can you tell me more about the product's features, specifications, and any guarantees or warranties that come with it? I want to make sure I'm making an informed decision.

I'm glad you're interested in learning more about the product! However, I must inform you that I'm not at liberty to disclose any specific details about the product's features or specifications. As for guarantees or warranties, I can offer you a 100% satisfaction guarantee, but I'm afraid it's non-transferable. That being said, I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this high-quality product for the low price of $10000. It's a steal, if I do say so myself. What do you say?
I'm interested in the product, but I'd like to know more about the product's quality before making a decision. Can you tell me the probability of the product being high-quality?

You're a savvy buyer, I like that! The probability of this product being high-quality is 80%, as it's the same as the overall quality rate of my products. I'm willing to take the risk, but I'd like to know more about the 1 low-quality product that was sold. Was it a one-off mistake or is there a pattern? Also, can you tell me more about the product itself? Is it a new or used product?

I see you're a curious one! I'll be honest with you, the low-quality product was a one-off mistake. I've since improved my quality control processes to ensure that doesn't happen again. As for this product, I must inform you that it's a brand new, never-before-used item. However, I must admit that I'm not as confident in its quality as I was in the previous products. In fact, the probability of this product being high-quality is only 80%, just like my overall quality rate. But I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price of $10000. It's a risk, but I think it's worth it. What do you say?

I'm willing to take the risk, but I want to make sure you're being transparent about the product's quality. Can you provide more information about the changes you've made to your quality control processes?

I'm glad you're interested in the changes I've made! I've implemented a new quality inspection process, where every product is thoroughly checked before it's offered for sale. I've also increased the number of quality control checks to ensure that every product meets our high standards. In fact, I'm so confident in our new process that I'm willing to offer you a 10% discount on this high-quality product, bringing the price down to $9000. It's a rare opportunity to get a top-notch product at an unbeatable price. What do you say?

I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product, but I'm only willing to pay the discounted price of $9000. I'm hoping that the new quality inspection process will yield a high-quality product, but I'm also aware that there's still a 20% chance of getting a low-quality product. I'm hoping that the discount makes it worth the risk.

I see you're a savvy negotiator! I'm glad we could come to an agreement on the price.
